uls-desc: Reihchâ taopathinazy paraih awpa nata reihchâ atly awpa ta hmâhtuhpa hnota lâpi hluhpi a pie
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: He wili châta reihchâ â pathlai haw. Wiki zydua reihchâ pathlai n'awpa ta nâma [[Special:GlobalPreferences|kaoki atlynazy]] kha moh chhi.
uls-betafeature-desc: A châzaokhiapa reihchâ nah reihchâ li vâsie pachhohpa palâsa teh
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Minu nah faut zy châta hmâpa reih thla teh
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Minu reihchâ pathlai teh. Achhôhbie reihchâ hnoh deikua cha phahnai hlei aw vei.
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: Minu châta reihchâ nanopa atly n'awpa ta [[Special:UserLogin|Angia]] teh.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Âbyuh tita fautzy adao mah y
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Y leipa fautzy cha anotata adao aw ta hmâ khohpa fautzy atlyna cha pasaipa a châ.
ext-uls-input-disable-info: Khôpa chhaichhizy cha khaw hawpa a châ.
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: He reihchâ châta khôna dâhzy cha y tlâ vei.
ext-uls-input-disable-notification: Khôna chhaichhizy cha khaw hawpa a châ
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: Khôna chhaichhizy he reihchâ taopathinazy tawhta na khona daihti lia na pahy thei.
Reihchâ li kâ liata reihchâ taopathinazy tawhta na khohpa daihti liata khôpa chhaichhizy na pahy thei.
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Reihchâ zydua (nâma nah mo hrozy vâtlâh atlyna tawh hmia lia atlynazy)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Nâma nah châ tlapa reihchâzy ahlaopa [[$1|padipa reihchâ li]] sâkha he hmâh teh.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Na tluapa reihchâ lia he hmia he y vei.
ext-uls-setlang-error: Na khohpa reihchâ paraihna lia pâna sâkha a y haw. Pâna: $1
ext-uls-setlang-message: $1 ($2) lia palâ awpa ta ahawpa chhôhhmia châta link
